projects.title: Product Idea Generator
projects.description: Leading product feature for Pillar that takes a users niche and other data collected by Pillar to help new users come up with digital products they can sell.

projects.title: Digital Product Creator
projects.description: Back office tool to increase efficiency of the Pillar sales team A key task for them is to work with influencers and help them launch on the Pillar platform with succesful lead magnets and digital products. This tool enables them to enter a topic and type of digital product they would like to make and automatically generates an editable outline which then generates the first draft of the digital product that can then be uploaded to canva for styling.

projects.title: Cohesion AI - Browser Extension + Backend
projects.description: Browser extension that captures actions user has completed. It uses machine learning to identify patterns and provide user with next-step automation and recommended workflows to automate their tasks and complete repetative work more effectively

projects.title: Cribs.AI - Mobile App + Backend
projects.description: Interior design app built with react-native for IOS and android that lets you imagine what your house would look like with new decor/style, basically doing the job of an expensive interior designer, for much less. Once the user finds a style they like, it can also search online for furniture from the new ai generated style.

projects.title: Synth
projects.description: Electron based desktop app that ingests local content and records what it sees and hears. Then lets user talk to their documents and data. LlamaIndex based retrieval augmented generation.

projects.title: Content Awesome
projects.description: Web based tool that takes a business description, provides key search terms for the niche, then generates teasers and blog content to sound authoritative on topics specific to user provided business

projects.title: Interactive AI
projects.description: Web app that uses your camera to let you interact with particles representing objects the user inputs that are generated by self hosted stable diffusion transformer model. Designed to operate on a laptop and projected on a screen. Used for advertising and to draw attention to a booth at conferences.

projects.title: F5 News
projects.description: Trending news site built with AWS Lambdas that monitor web trends, storing data in a cloud-hosted MongoDB and presenting it to users via an AWS-hosted React UI. Custom Logistic Regression model implementation to predict upvotes for new posts

projects.title: BirdCam
projects.description: Rapsberry pi project with embedded camera in a custom 3d printed enclosure that mounts to a window. It detects birds and classifies them and sends notifications of short clips.
